schema.title: Schema
schema.description: Schema of the referenced document if different from that of the parent.

type.title: Type
type.description:
Type of the document referenced according to the defined schema or that of the
parent document.

issue_date.title: Issue Date
issue_date.description: IssueDate reflects the date the document was issued.

series.title: Series
series.description: Series the referenced document belongs to.

code.title: Code
code.description: Source document's code or other identifier.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency used in the document, if different from the parent's currency.

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: Line index numbers inside the document, if relevant.

identities.title: Identities
identities.description: List of additional codes, IDs, or SKUs which can be used to identify the document or its contents, agreed upon by the supplier and customer.

period.title: Period
period.description: Tax period in which the referred document had an effect required by some tax regimes and formats.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Human readable description on why this reference is here or needs to be used.

stamps.title: Stamps
stamps.description: Seals of approval from other organizations that may need to be listed.

tax.title: Tax
tax.description:
Tax total breakdown from the original document in the provided currency. Should
only be included if required by a specific tax regime or addon.

payable.title: Payable
payable.description:
Payable is the total amount that is payable in the referenced document. Only needed
for specific tax regimes or addons. This may also be used in some scenarios
to determine the proportion of the referenced document that has been paid, and
calculate the remaining amount due and taxes.

ext.title: Extensions
ext.description: Extensions for additional codes that may be required.

meta.title: Meta
meta.description: Meta contains additional information about the document.

DocumentRef.description: DocumentRef is used to describe an existing document or a specific part of it's contents.
